title: ACCOUNTING
de_requirements:
(i)  Two subjects in HSC, GCE A Level to include Accounting

(ii) OND in Accounting with a minimum of lower credit grade, or

(iii) HND in relevant discipline with at least lower credit, or

(iv) passed the Skills Level/P.E.1/Intermediate examinations of a recognized professional Accounting bodies such as ICAN and ACCA
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at Two (2) sittings to include English Language, Mathematics and Economics/Financial Accounting and any 2 or 3 subjects in SSE, GCE or NECO
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any two Social or Management science subjects

title: ADULT EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i)    Two (2) 'A' Level   passes.

(ii)   NCE with passes in two (2) subjects at Merit level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes or Six (6) ‘O’ Level  Credits at Two (2) sittings  including English Language, and any other subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts, Social Science and/or Science.

title: AGRIC EXTENSION & RURAL DEVELOPMENT
de_requirements: Two (2)  ‘A’ level passes in Chemistry and One from Biology / Botany / Zoology / Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology / Mathematics (Pure & Applied)
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Agriculture or Biology, Mathematics or Physics

title: AGRICULTURAL & ENVIRONMENTAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus UME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work. SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any from Introduction to Agricultural Science, Materials and Workshop Process and Machining, Tractor Layout Power Unit Under Carriage and Auto Electricity; Transmission System; Implement and Machine; Principles of Crop Husbandry and Land Use, Materials and Workshop Processes; Construction and Maintenance of Agricultural Machines; general Metal Work; General Wood Work and Building/Engineering Drawing.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

title: AGRICULTURAL ECONOMICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Chemistry and One from Biology / Botany / Zoology / Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology / Mathematics (Pure & Applied)
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Agriculture or Biology, Mathematics or Physics

title: AGRICULTURE

utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at two (2) sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Agriculture or Biology, Mathematics or Physics

title: AGRONOMY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Chemistry and One from Biology / Botany / Zoology / Agricultural Science, Economics, Physics, Geography and Geology / Mathematics (Pure & Applied)
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at two (2) sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics.

title: ANIMAL SCIENCE

utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Agriculture or Biology, Mathematics or Physics

title: ANTHROPOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Arts subjects or NCE with Credit pass in Arts subjects: Geography / Economics
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one (1) sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at two (2) sittings to include English Language, two Arts subjects and others from Arts or Social Sciences subjects.  Commerce, Business Studies, Book Keeping, Accounting and Civic Education are not acceptable
subjects: English Language, one Arts subject and any two Arts or Social Sciences. Commerce, Business Studies, Book Keeping, Accounting and Civic Education are not acceptable

title: ANTHROPOLOGY (BIOLOGICAL)
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes or NCE (at least a Credit pass) in Biology and any of the following Science subjects Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Geography
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two other Science subjects excluding Agricultural Science) from Chemistry, Physics and Geography.
subjects: English Language, Biology and two other Science subjects from Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and Geography

title: AQUACULTURE & FISHERIES MANAGEMENT

utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, Biology/Agric Science, Chemistry, Mathematics and anyone/two of Geography, Physics and Economics

utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include:  English Language, Arabic and any other subjects from Arts, Social Science or Science.
subjects: English Language, Arabic and any other two from Arts, Science or Social Sciences

title: ARCHAEOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes or NCE with Credit pass in Arts subjects: Geography / Economics
utme_requirements: Five (5) English Language, one Arts subject and any two Arts or Social Sciences. Commerce, Business Studies, Book Keeping, Accounting and Civic Education are not acceptable
subjects: Any two (2) subjects from Arts, Social Sciences and one of History, Religious Studies, Government and Geography.

title: ARCHEAOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)     Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Geography, Chemistry,                Mathematics, Physics,

(ii)    NCE with passes at credit level in Biology and any of the following Science  subjects Mathematics, Physics,  Chemistry and Geography
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology and two other Science subjects excluding Agricultural Science from Chemistry, Physics and Geography.
subjects: English Language, Biology and two other Science subjects from Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics and Geography

title: ARCHITECTURE
de_requirements:
(i)       Two (2) 'A' Level passes chosen from Mathematics or Physics and Chemistry, Geography or Fine Arts.

ND/HND upper credits in relevant field.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and any of Fine Art, Geography or Wood Work, Biology, Economics, Technical Drawing, Further. Mathematics., Introduction to Building Construction, Bricklaying/Block laying, Concreting, Wall, Floors and Ceiling Finishing, Joinery, Carpentary, Decorative Painting, Lining, Sign and Design, Wall Hanging, Colour Mixing/Matching and Glazing, Ceramics, Graphics Design, Graphic Printing, Basic Electricity.
subjects: Physics, Mathematics, and any of Chemistry, Geography, Art, Biology and Economics.

title: AUTOMOTIVE ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus O/L requirements
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at two (2) sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work.

subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any of Commerce, Business Studies, Principles of Accounting, Marketing, Geography and Government

subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

SSC credit passes to include Physics, Chemistry, Mathematics, English Language and one Science subject

title: CLASSICAL STUDIES

subjects: English Language, Literature in English or History and any other two subjects.

title: COMMUNICATION & LANGUAGE ARTS

(ii)  OND (Mass Communication) with an Upper Credit grade only.

subjects: English Language, Literature in English and any other from Arts, Social Sciences or Science [Please note that Government and Economics are not Arts subjects]

title: COMMUNICATION & LANGUAGE ARTS EDUCATION

[Please note that Government and Economics are not Arts subjects]
subjects: English Language and two Arts subjects including Literature in English and any other one from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: EDUCATION & BIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level science subjects to include Biology or Zoology.   NCE/ND candidates with minimum of Merit or Upper Credit in two science subjects to include Biology or Zoology or Animal Science.  Direct entry candidate should also fulfil the UTME entry requirement.

title: HUMAN NUTRITION & DIETETICS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' level Passes in Chemistry, Biology and Physics plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Biology and Physics.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: IGBO
de_requirements: A level pass of not less than 'D' grade in Igbo and One Arts/Social Science subjects. NCE (in Igbo and any other Arts or Social Science subjects with at least a merit). Relevant degree holders may also apply.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, one Arts subject and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language, one Arts subject and any other two subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: INDUSTRIAL CHEMISTRY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level subjects including Chemistry and one of Physics, Mathematics and Biology.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and any subject as the 6th subject.
subjects: English Language, Chemistry, Physics, Mathematics or Biology

title: INDUSTRIAL PRODUCTION ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus UME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics

title: INTERNATIONAL RELATIONS
de_requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Social Science subject from Government/History, Economics, Sociology and Business Management.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Government or History and three (3) relevant subjects.
subjects: Economics, Literature in English and Geography/Government/History.

title: ISLAMIC STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Islamic Studies and any other Arts or Social Science subjects
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or Six (6) 'O' level subjects at two (2) sittings to include:  English Language, Islamic Studies and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language, Islamic Studies and any other two subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences

title: LAW
de_requirements: (i)   Two papers at Advanced Level plus Credit in 5/6 other ‘O’ level subjects including English Language and Literature in English.    (ii)  A good first Degree with credit in English Language and Literature at 'O' Level
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Literature in English and any other subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language and any three subjects from Arts, Social Science and / or Science.

title: LIBRARY & INFORMATION SCIENCE
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant subject plus the UTME requirements.

(ii) NCE merit passes in relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at  two (2) sittings in English Language, Mathematics and any other three or four relevant subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language and any other three subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: LINGUISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE to include any Language, preferably an African Language.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, one Arts subject and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language, one Arts subject and any other two subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: LINGUISTICS /YORUBA
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes or NCE to include any Language, preferably an African Language.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language.
subjects: Any Language and two (2) other subjects.

title: MARKETING AND CONSUMER STUDIES
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Economics, Business Management, Commerce, or Government.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at Two (2) sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Economics, Marketing/Commerce, and any one or two credit passes from Arts and Social Sciences subjects.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Economics, and any one of Marketing, Commerce, Government or Geography

title: MATHEMATICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level subjects including Mathematics and any Science subject OR NCE with at least merit in Mathematics and one other approved Science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at English Language, Mathematics, and any two Science subjects from the following: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics, Geography and other subject as the 6th subject.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, any two of the following: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics or Geography

title: MECHANICAL ENGINEERING
de_requirements:
(i)        Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus UTME requirements..

(ii)       ND upper credit, NCE technical and HND in Mechanical Engineering.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at two (2) sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics

title: MEDICAL LABORATORY SCIENCE
de_requirements: 3 A level passes in Chemistry, Biology and one other science subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ Level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: MEDICINE & SURGERY
de_requirements: i)     3 A level passes in Physics, Chemistry, Biology or Zoology plus UME requirements.    (ii)  B.Sc in relevant fields.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ Level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: MICROBIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Botany/Biology and Chemistry or OND Microbiology or HND Microbiology & Virology with Upper Credit admissible to 200 level.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one (1) sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level subjects at two (2) sittings to include English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Mathematics and any one or two other Science subjects (excluding Agric Science)
subjects: English Language, Biology, Chemistry, Physics or Geography or Mathematics

title: MUSIC
de_requirements: An 'A' Level Pass in Music plus any other TWO 'A' Level subjects.    *NCE with major in Music with a minimum of a Credit.  *Any good degree or HND with Grade VI ABRSM or MUSON Certificate.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include:  English Language, and any other four or five subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language, Music and any other two subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.

title: NURSING/NURSING SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two (2) A level Passes from Biology, Chemistry, Physics, plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ level Credit Passes in English Language, Biology, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: PETROLEUM ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus UME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics

title: PHARMACY
de_requirements: (i)     A/Level Passes in Chemistry, Biology, Physics or Mathematics plus UME requirements.  (ii)  B.Sc. degree in relevant fields
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ Level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology at a single sitting.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: PHILOSOPHY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in ONE Arts subject and any other Arts/Social Science or Science (e.g., Mathematics, Physics, etc.) subject.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include:  English Language, one Arts subject and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language, one Arts subject and any other two subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: PHYSICS
de_requirements: ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics, NCE and OND holders are eligible.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include:  English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any two or three of the following: Biology, Chemistry, Geography and Further Mathematics
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any of the following: Biology, Chemistry, Geography and Further Mathematics

title: PHYSIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two A level subjects from Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Zoology or Botany plus UME requirement.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ Level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: PHYSIOTHERAPY
de_requirements: 3 A/Level Passes in Physics, Biology or Zoology and one other Science subject plus UTME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O’ Level Credit Passes in English Language, Mathematics, Physics, Chemistry and Biology
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: POLITICAL SCIENCE
de_requirements: Two 'A’ level passes including Government or History
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Government/History and two or three other subjects.
subjects: English Language, Government or History plus two other Social Science / Arts subjects

title: PSYCHOLOGY
de_requirements:
(i)     Two 'A' level passes including Mathematics  and any  of Biology/Chemistry/Statistics/Government/Geography/ Economics.

 (ii)    UTME requirements plus NRN certificate.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology and any other two/three from Arts, Social Science or Science
subjects: English Language, Biology, Economics/Government and any other  from Social Sciences or Science

title: QUANTITY SURVEYING
de_requirements: ND/OND with Upper Credit in Quantity Surveying, Engineering, Architecture or Building Technology
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes in one attempt in English Language, Mathematics, Physics and any other two from Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Economics, Further Mathematics, Geography, Biology, Fine Arts, Accounting OR Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at two (2) sittings to include English Language, Mathematics and Physics and any other three subjects from Chemistry, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Fine Arts, Accounting, Further mathematics and Biology
subjects: English, Mathematics, Physics and Biology/Economics/Chemistry/Geography/Accounting

title: RELIGIOUS STUDIES
de_requirements: Two ‘A’ level passes to include Religious studies or CRK and one other subject in Arts/Social Sciences
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at two (2) sittings to include English Language, CRK and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and two other subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: RUSSIAN
de_requirements: Two (2)  ‘A’ level passes in Russian and any other subject in Arts and Social Science subjects. OR The equivalent of A/L Certificate.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ Level passes at ONE sitting or 6 ‘O’ Level credit passes at TWO sittings to include English Literature and any three or four other subjects from Arts and Social Science subjects.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English plus any two Arts or Social Science subject.

title: RUSSIAN WITH FRENCH/GERMAN
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes including the Foreign Language(s) where applicable.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include French, English Language and any three (3) other subjects.
subjects: French and any two (2) other Arts/Social Science subjects.

title: SOCIOLOGY
de_requirements: Two 'A’ level passes including Government or History
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one sitting or Five (6) 'O' level credit passes at two sittings to include: English Language, Mathematics and any other subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences.
subjects: English Language and any other three subjects from Arts, Science or Social Sciences

title: SPECIAL EDUCATION
de_requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

(ii) NCE merit in Arts or Social Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level credit passes at one (1) sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level credit passes at two (2) sittings to include English Language and any other four or five relevant subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language and any other three relevant subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: STATISTICS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level subjects to include Mathematics or University of Ibadan Professional Diploma in Statistics or its equivalent (plus five ‘O’ level credit passes including English Language and Mathematics)
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include:  English Language, Mathematics and any other three subjects from the following: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics or Geography.  Economics will be counted as the 6th subject.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics and any of the following subjects: Biology, Chemistry, Physics, Further Mathematics or Geography

title: TEACHER EDUCATION SCIENCE:
de_requirements:
(i)  Two (2) 'A' Level passes in relevant teaching subjects including Literature in English.

(ii)  NCE credit or merit in two(2)relevant subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' Level credit passes to include English Language and Literature in English plus three (3) other Arts or Social Science subjects.
subjects: Literature in English and one (1) Art and any other subject.

title: THEATRE ARTS
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Arts, Social Science or Science subjects.
utme_requirements: Five (5)‘O’ Level Credits at ONE sitting or 6 ‘O’ Level  Credits at TWO sittings to include English Language, Literature in English and other subjects from Arts or Social Science.
subjects: English Language, Literature in English and two other subjects from Arts or Social Sciences.

title: URBAN & REGIONAL PLANNING
de_requirements:
(i)  A/L passes in Mathematics and any of Physics , Chemistry and Geography.

(ii) OND at Upper Credit in Architecture, URP or Building Technology
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level credit passes at one sitting or Six (6) 'O' level credit passes at two sitting to include English Language, Mathematics, Geography and any two from Physics, Chemistry, Biology, Technical Drawing, Fine Arts, Surveying.
subjects: English Language, Mathematics, Geography and Physics/ Chemistry/r Biology.

title: VETERINARY MEDICINE
de_requirements: ‘A’ level passes in Chemistry, Biology/Zoology, Physics/Mathematics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level Credit at one sitting or Six (6) ‘O’ level Credit passes at two (2) sittings to include: English Language, Mathematics, Chemistry, Physics, Biology and any other Science subject.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Biology

title: WILDLIFE MANAGEMENT
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ Level passes in Chemistry and Biology/Botany/Agric Science/Zoology/Physics.
utme_requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science, Mathematics and Physics/Geography/Economics.
subjects: Chemistry, Biology/Agricultural Science and Mathematics/ Physics

title: WOOD PRODUCTS ENGINEERING
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level passes in Physics and Mathematics plus UME requirements.
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Physics, Chemistry and Mathematics with any ONE or TWO of the following subjects as the case may be; Biology, Agricultural Science, Further Mathematics, Technical Drawing, Economics, Geography, Metal Work and Wood Work.
subjects: English Language, Physics, Chemistry, and Mathematics.

title: YORUBA
de_requirements: A level pass of not less than 'D' grade in Yoruba and One Arts/Social Science subjects. NCE (in Yoruba and any other Arts or Social Science subjects with at least a merit). Relevant degree holders may also apply
utme_requirements: Five (5) 'O' level subjects at one sitting or 6 'O' level subjects at two sittings to include: English Language, one Arts subject and any other three or four subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.
subjects: English Language, one Arts subject and any other two subjects from Arts, Social Sciences or Science.

title: ZOOLOGY
de_requirements: Two (2) ‘A’ level Science subjects to include Biology/Zoology
utme_requirements: Five (5) ‘O’ level subjects at one sitting or 6 ‘O’ level subjects at 2 sittings to include English Language, Mathematics, Biology, Chemistry and any other Science subjects.
